name: A.I.
description: The character possesses an artificial intelligence in a computerized mind.

name: Alien Heritage
description: The character—or at least one of their ancestors—is not from Earth.

name: Alternate Form
description: The character can change from their regular human form into another form and back.

name: Amphibious
description: The character can breathe just fine underwater and can see and hear well in it too.

name: Auditory Issues
description: The character has trouble hearing that can range from partial to full deafness.

name: Authority
description: The character has a legal authority of some kind.

name: Backup
description: The character is part of an organization—like a police force—that they can call for immediate backup at any time.

name: Black Market Access
description: The character knows how and where they can buy and sell hard-to-find and potentially illegal things.

name: Blind
description: The character is permanently blinded.

name: Chaotic
description: The character has been affected by the chaos lord Chthon.

name: Convict
description: The character has been convicted of a crime, which is reflected on their record.

name: Cursed
description: Willingly or not, the character is affiliated with Hell.

name: Deaf
description: The character is permanently deafened.

name: Deceased
description: The character is technically dead-although presumably still able to interact with the rest of the world in some way.

name: Dependents
description: The character has young children, elderly relatives or others who rely on them.

name: Enemy
description: There's someone out there who has sworn to defeat the character.

name: Eternally Immortal
description: The character does not age and could theoretically live forever.

name: Extreme Appearance
description: The character looks very different than the average person (wherever they happen to be) and cannot easily hide their identity.

name: Gamma Mutate
description: Gamma radiation does not harm the character. Instead, it's the source of their powers.

name: Green Door
description: After being killed, the character can come back to life by passing through the Green Door, a portal that connects a part of the afterlife to Earth.

name: Hard of Hearing
description: The character has difficulty hearing, although this can often be corrected with hearing aids.

name: Headquarters
description: The character has a base, cave or lair they can use to recover from wounds, repair or store equipment, work on inventions and so on.

name: Heroic
description: The character acts heroically.

name: Hounded
description: The character is a member of a group of people who are persecuted for simply being themselves.

name: Hunted
description: The character is hunted by the law for crimes they have supposedly (or actually) committed.

name: Imageless
description: The character casts no reflection, and their image cannot be captured by cameras.

name: Immunity
description: The character is immune to the usual effects of something.

name: Inhuman Genes
description: The character has latent Inhuman genes that cause them to develop super-powers when exposed to the Terrigen Mist.

name: Krakoan
description: As a mutant, the character is automatically a citizen of the island-nation of Krakoa and can travel to and from there freely.

name: Lab Access
description: The character either owns or has access to a laboratory filled with the technical equipment, supplies and tools they need for their work.

name: Leader
description: The character is an acknowledged leader of a large and important organization, all the way up to and including an entire nation.

name: Linguist
description: The character is fluent in a language other than their native tongue.

name: Lunar Transformation
description: On the three nights that the moon is at its fullest and while the moon is above the horizon, the character must transform into a werewolf and is ruled by their animal nature.

name: Mahd Wy'ry
description: The character lives for so long that their accumulated memories have the potential to drive them insane.

name: Mentor
description: The character knows an older person they can ask for advice, even when it comes to having super-powers.

name: Mute
description: The character cannot speak.

name: Mysterious
description: The character does not entirely understand how or why they have powers.

name: Obligation
description: The character is responsible to certain people, places or organizations who rely on them.

name: Poor
description: The character has little access to money and struggles to make ends meet.

name: Powerful
description: The character has access to the resources of their entire community.

name: Prescription Pad
description: The character can write prescriptions for various kinds of medication.

name: Public Identity
description: The character's real identity is known to the public.

name: Radioactive
description: The character constantly emits low levels of some sort of radiation.

name: Rich
description: The character has access to plenty of money.

name: Secret Identity
description: The character's real identity is a secret to the public, and they must take precautions to maintain this status.

name: Signature Weapon
description: The character is known for owning and using a specific type of weapon, like Hawkeye's bow or Elektra's sai.

name: Sorcerous
description: The character has dedicated themself to the study of traditional magic, also known as sorcery.

name: Streetwise
description: The character knows how things are handled on the street, who’s in charge of various criminal enterprises and how to avoid issues with them.

name: Supernatural
description: The character has powers that are magical or based on something magical.

name: Villianous
description: The character is a villain, someone who cares little for the rights of others, up to and including their right to live.

name: Vision Issues
description: The character has trouble seeing that can range from partial to full blindness.

name: Weapon
description: The character has a weapon or type of weapon they prefer.

name: Worshipped
description: The character is worshipped by others as a god.

name: X-Gene
description: The character has mutant genes that cause them to develop super-powers.

name: Young
description: The character is a minor, under 18 years old.
